So excited to announce that I've accepted a Recruiter position with Insight Global. I couldn't be any happier to make a career of helping people find jobs and helping companies find the perfect employees.
I am so thankful to Ohio University for presenting me with the opportunities I've had during my time here.
The people I've met, faculty and fellow students, and the experiences I've had because of this school have been invaluable to my growth, professionally and personally.
The EW Scripps School of Journalism is truly unparalleled in the opportunities it offers to its students, and I couldn't be more certain I made the right decision in becoming a Bobcat.
I can't wait to begin this new chapter in Columbus, Ohio upon graduation in May.
Also thank you to my amazing family for the endless love and support, and for pushing me to be the best version of myself every day. I love you all so much.
